Introduction

Crazy for Loving [You]380-you ( A Bluewater Billionaire Romantic Comedy )

Is there anything hotter than [a growly , overprotective Marine]382-a growly , overprotective marine cradling [a baby]383-a baby ? [My]0-i melted ovaries do n’t think so .

When [you]380-you work hard and have the bank account to prove it , [you]380-you ’re entitled to play hard . [I]0-i ’ve seen some crazy things . [I]0-i ’ve caused some crazy scenes . And there ’s no shame in [my]0-i game .

But [I]0-i ’m still knocked off [my]0-i stilettos when an insane chain of events leads to [me]0-i inheriting [a baby]383-a baby . The craziest part ? [The baby]385-the baby comes with a by - the - books , [no - nonsense retired Marine who 's so regimented that [I]0-i would n't be surprised if [he]386-no - nonsense retired marine who 's so regimented that i would n't be surprised if he irons his boxer shorts . parenting irons [his]386-no - nonsense retired marine who 's so regimented that i would n't be surprised if he irons his boxer shorts . parenting boxer shorts .

Parenting]386-no - nonsense retired marine who 's so regimented that i would n't be surprised if he irons his boxer shorts . parenting ? Bring it on . [I]0-i do n’t need sleep — [I]0-i once started [my]0-i day with business meetings in [Cairo]1-cairo and ended it three days later at [a club in [Melbourne]2-melbourne]387-a club in melbourne . Changing diapers ? Please . It ca n't be any more challenging than changing out of Spanx on the back of [a moving motorcycle]388-a moving motorcycle . Training [the little guy]389-the little guy to run [[the family]390-the family ’s real estate empire]391-the family ’s real estate empire ? [He]389-the little guy ’ll be [all [our]393-our bosses]392-all our bosses by the time [he]389-the little guy ’s four .

But living with [[my]0-i new co - guardian]394-my new co - guardian ? [The gruff , muscled , tattooed former military man who manages to check all [my]0-i boxes while trying to sneak under [my]0-i skin]395-the gruff , muscled , tattooed former military man who manages to check all my boxes while trying to sneak under my skin ?

[He]389-the little guy needs to go .

Because the longer [he]389-the little guy stays , the more layers [he]389-the little guy ’s peeling off [my]0-i heart .

But love is n’t something that ’s ever diluted [my]0-i gene pool , and [I]0-i like [my]0-i life just fine without it . [I]0-i have [awesome friends]396-awesome friends , [this adorable baby and an obscene amount of money]397-this adorable baby and an obscene amount of money . Who needs love ?

Turns out … maybe [me]0-i .

Crazy for Loving [You]398-you is a larger - than life ride through accidental parenthood featuring [a fun - loving billionaire playgirl]399-a fun - loving billionaire playgirl , [a crusty Marine with a gooey center , a horny dolphin]400-a crusty marine with a gooey center , a horny dolphin , [the world ’s most obscene pool]401-the world ’s most obscene pool , and all the fun [you]398-you ’d expect from [a world built by [Lucy Score]123-lucy score the mogul]402-a world built by lucy score , [Claire Kingsley]124-claire kingsley wild open hearts , [Kathryn Nolan]125-kathryn nolan , and [Pippa Grant]126-pippa grant .

One

Daisy Carter - Kincaid]126-pippa grant , aka [a ( semi - self - made ) billionaire]405-a ( semi - self - made ) billionaire who ’s never met a challenge [she]405-a ( semi - self - made ) billionaire could n’t take down in a dance - off while wearing Manolos and shooting Fireball . Until very , very soon …

When [I]0-i die , [they]406-they might not call [me]0-i [the classiest lady to ever live]407-the classiest lady to ever live . Or the smartest . Or even the richest . But there ’s nothing like a funeral with very few tears to inspire [a person]408-a person to at least want to be missed . “ [I]409-my mother wonder if [she]405-a ( semi - self - made ) billionaire would ’ve given the flowers one star for the orchids being peach instead of apricot , ”[409-my mother] [[my]0-i mother]409-my mother murmurs over [her]409-my mother mai tai . West

Thirty

Forty - Three

Sneak Peek at [MASTER BAKER]353-master baker

Love dirty - talking bakers , [small town rivalries]3428-small town rivalries , and falling back in love with [the one who got away]3429-the one who got away ? Read on for a sample of [MASTER BAKER]353-master baker !

About [the Author

Pippa Grant]374-pippa is [a USA Today Bestselling author who writes romantic comedies that will make tears run down [your]3545-your leg]3544-a usa today bestselling author who writes romantic comedies that will make tears run down your leg .
